timeline.bodyText: previous is meant to be borderless
timeline.author: macgills
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -103,29 +103,29 @@
         android:background="@color/divider_grey" />
 
     <Button
-        android:id="@+id/depicts_next"
-        style="@style/Widget.AppCompat.Button.Borderless"
-        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
-        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-        android:layout_marginEnd="24dp"
-        android:layout_marginRight="24dp"
-        android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
-        android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"
-        android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
-        android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
-        android:text="@string/next" />
+      android:id="@+id/depicts_next"
+      style="@style/Widget.AppCompat.Button"
+      android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+      android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+      android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
+      android:layout_marginEnd="24dp"
+      android:layout_marginRight="24dp"
+      android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
+      android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"
+      android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
+      android:text="@string/next" />
 
     <Button
-        android:id="@+id/depicts_previous"
-        style="@style/Widget.AppCompat.Button.Borderless"
-        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
-        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-        android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/standard_gap"
-        android:layout_marginRight="@dimen/standard_gap"
-        android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
-        android:layout_toStartOf="@id/depicts_next"
-        android:layout_toLeftOf="@id/depicts_next"
-        android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
-        android:text="@string/previous" />
+      android:id="@+id/depicts_previous"
+      style="@style/Widget.AppCompat.Button"

timeline.bodyText: I would think omitting this is equivalent so this line can be deleted
timeline.author: macgills
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -103,29 +103,29 @@
         android:background="@color/divider_grey" />
 
     <Button
-        android:id="@+id/depicts_next"
-        style="@style/Widget.AppCompat.Button.Borderless"
-        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
-        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-        android:layout_marginEnd="24dp"
-        android:layout_marginRight="24dp"
-        android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
-        android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"
-        android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
-        android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
-        android:text="@string/next" />
+      android:id="@+id/depicts_next"
+      style="@style/Widget.AppCompat.Button"

replies.bodyText: @siamsot does removing this style line produce the same results?
replies.author: macgills

replies.bodyText: Indeed it does so I removed the line
replies.author: siamsot
